author: tmohamed@businessinsider.com (Theron Mohamed)
title: 'Black Swan' author Nassim Taleb tells BI he agrees with Elon Musk on debt, saying a 'crisis' is looming
description: Author Nassim Nicholas Taleb said the interest on the US debt is a huge burden, and called out Trump's tariffs and the dollar's decline.
content:
Elon Musk is right to worry about America's debt problem and bitcoin is no more valuable than a flower, author Nassim Nicholas Taleb said in a wide-ranging interview with Business Insider.
